name: VKDAKeyboardControl
summary: Easily add keyboard awareness and scrolling dismissal. Allows to add subview to keyboard.
description: VKDAKeyboardControl allows you to easily add keyboard awareness and scrolling dismissal (a receding keyboard ala iMessages app) to any UIView subclass with only 1 line of code. Allows to add subview to keyboard. Based on Daniel Amitay's DAKeyboardControl. https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/DAKeyboardControl
